{
  "firstName": "user",
  "lastName": "todelete",
  "email": "user.todelete@luv2code.com",
  "password": "todelete"
}


"SELECT COUNT(u) FROM User u JOIN u.authorities a WHERE a.authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN'"

select
	u1_0.id,
	u1_0.created_at,
	u1_0.email,
	u1_0.first_name,
	u1_0.last_name,
	u1_0.password,
	u1_0.updated_at,
	a1_0.user_id,
	a1_0.authority 
from
	users u1_0 
left join
	user_authorities a1_0 
		on u1_0.id=a1_0.user_id 
where
	u1_0.id=1;
